accounts/products/sales.description: Retrieve the sales data for a single product.

account_id.description: The account connection id. You can get all you account  connection info by calling/v1.2/accounts

break_down.description: The breakdown allows you to specify by which dimensions the results should be broken down. If not specified, the default behavior is to aggregate data for all countries, all dates and all products.

start_date.description: Dates should be in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

end_date.description: Dates should be in the format yyyy-mm-dd.For the breakdown product+country+date, please note that the date range can not exceed one year.

currency.description: The short name of currency in which to present revenue data. You can get the currency definition at /v1.2/meta/currency

countries.description: Retrieve results for a specific country or countries. The format is a plus-separated list of country code. For example: “US+FR” will return the sales data in America and France. You can get all countries code at /v1.2/meta/countries

page_index.description: Large responses will be split into several pages. The page index  is the page  that will be returned. If the page_index is out of  range, error status 400 and  the relative error message will be  returned.
